one-field-required: You must report at least one value for the fields
storage-type-desc: Indicates whether the location is used to store merchandise on pallets or is a place where merchandise can be picked up for orders/sales.
location-desc: Physical location of the merchandise. You can enter the different values (Aisle/Rack/Shelf/Drawer) separated by space. This will help you filter when selecting the location. IMPORTANT: Once a location is selected you must delete all the text to select another.
